name: robotlab-x
description: A cross platform desktop application for creating and running robots

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd server && yarn run electron-dev"
scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist build client/dist client/build server/dist
scripts.clean-modules: shx rm -rf node_modules && shx rm -rf client/node_modules && shx rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.install-client: shx mkdir -p server/dist/ && shx mv client/build server/dist/client
scripts.build-win: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn run electron-build-win
scripts.build-linux: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn run electron-build-linux
scripts.build-mac: yarn build-client && yarn install-client && cd server && yarn run electron-build-mac
scripts.test: cd client && yarn run test-no-watch && cd ../server && yarn run test
scripts.test-coverage: cd client && yarn run test-coverage && cd ../server && yarn run test-coverage

author: GroG
